examples.example: 我买了一个棒棒糖，花了一块五，心里美滋滋的。

translate.english: I bought a lollipop and spent one yuan and fifty cents, feeling very pleased.

examples.example: 我用一块五买了一支铅笔，感觉很划算。

translate.english: I bought a pencil with one yuan and fifty cents and felt it was a very good deal.

examples.example: 我用一块五买了一本很有趣的书，真是物超所值。

translate.english: I bought a very interesting book with one yuan and fifty cents, and it is really a great value for money.
